sources.title: American Soldiers (2005) 24 Hours to Complete the Mission - a Sidney J. Furie War film
sources.description:
War-torn Iraq: Duty and conscience in a high-stakes moral standoff!
After discovering detainee mistreatment at a makeshift prison, Specialist Tyler Jackson and Sergeant Delvecchio lead their unit in an unauthorized prisoner release. Now branded as rogue operatives, they navigate treacherous urban combat zones while evading both insurgent forces and their own command.

Original Title: American Soldiers (2005) | AKA: Combat Zone

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
Curtis Morgan (Spc. Tyler Jackson)
Zan Calabretta (Sgt. Delvecchio)
Jordan Brown (Spc. Cohen)
Eddie Della Siepe (Pfc. Roy Pena)
Paul Sturino (Pfc. Dowdy)
Ben Gilbank (Pfc. Aikens)
Shaun Taylor (Sgt. Ron Stalker)
Brett Ryan (Spc. Romeo)
Philippe Buckland (Spc. Deke Carver)
Michael Belisaro (Pfc. Johnson)
Vince Salonia (Lt. Ahmed)

üé¨ CREW CREDITS
Directed by Sidney J. Furie (The Ipcress File, Iron Eagle)
Written by Greg Mellott
Tactical Coordination by Richard Norton (Matrix Reloaded, Pacific Rim)

üéØ WHY WATCH?
A controversial war drama that pulls no punches on moral ambiguity, & sparks debates about wartime morality that still resonate today! ‚öñÔ∏è
Gritty urban combat sequences with authentic military choreography üí•
Furie's signature high-tension direction keeps palms sweating üé¨

metadata.Plot: Iraq, 2004: during a routine sortie a US patrol is ambushed and the young soldiers are forced to put their training and skills into action fast. A determined foe with superior local knowledge, the Fedayeen insurgents soon draw them into close quarter combat and a desperate fight for survival.
metadata.Actors: Curtis Morgan, Zan Calabretta, Jordan Brown
